export default function SortCountries(key){var order=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:'asc';return function innerSort(a,b){if(!a.hasOwnProperty(key)||!b.hasOwnProperty(key)){// property doesn't exist on either object
return 0;}var varA=typeof a[key]==='string'?a[key].toUpperCase():a[key];var varB=typeof b[key]==='string'?b[key].toUpperCase():b[key];var comparison=0;if(varA>varB){comparison=1;}else if(varA<varB){comparison=-1;}return order==='desc'?comparison*-1:comparison;};}
